mapper.select: select zhtype as point,count(ip) as num from (select ip,zhtype from diagnosis,point where diagnosis.pid =point.id UNION all select ip,zhpoint from snmptrap) as tab group by point

select zhtype as point,count(ip) as num from (select ip,zhtype,time from diagnosis,point where diagnosis.pid =point.id UNION all select ip,zhpoint,time from snmptrap) as tab where time >= #{start} and time <= #{end} group by zhtype

select ip,count(ip) as num from (select ip,zhtype,time from diagnosis,point where diagnosis.pid=point.id UNION all select ip,zhpoint,time from snmptrap order by time desc) as tab group by ip order by num desc limit 10

select ip,count(ip) as num from (select ip,zhtype,time from diagnosis,point where diagnosis.pid=point.id UNION all select ip,zhpoint,time from snmptrap where time >=#{start} and time <= #{end} order by time desc) as tab group by ip order by num desc limit 10

select zhtype as name,count(zhtype) as value from (select zhtype from diagnosis,point where point.id = diagnosis.pid and diagnosis.ip=#{ip} UNION ALL select zhpoint from snmptrap where ip = #{ip}) as tab group by name

select zhtype as failuresName,count(zhtype) as num from (select zhtype,ip,time from diagnosis,point where point.id = diagnosis.pid and ip = #{ip} and time >= #{start} and time <= #{end} UNION ALL select zhpoint,ip,time from snmptrap where ip = #{ip} and time >= #{start} and time <= #{end} ) as tab group by failuresName
